name: Priyanka's Happy Hour (KubeCon EU 2022) featuring Priyanka Sharma, Executive Director at CNCF (Ship It! #52)
summary: Today we talk to Priyanka Sharma (E.D. at the Cloud Native Computing Foundation) about all things KubeCon Europe 2022. We start with Gerhard’s favourite subject - Priyanka’s Happy Hour - and then we switch focus to the conference. For many, this will be the first in-person KubeCon since 2019. As for Gerhard, he is not ...
